<script type="text/javascript">
	var doUpdate = function(){
		//Header menu mouse over
		var hover_flg = false;

		if(hover_flg == false){
			$('.HeadCartView.hoverMenu, .scroll-nav .liCartList').mouseenter(function(){
				$(this).find('.menu').stop(false, false).fadeIn(500, function(){
					hover_flg = true;
				});
			});
		}

			$('.HeadCartView.hoverMenu, .scroll-nav .liCartList').mouseleave(function(){
				if(hover_flg == true){
					$(this).find('.menu').stop(false, false).fadeOut(500, function(){
						hover_flg = false;
					});
				}
			});

		$(".closePopUpCartList, .popupCartList").click(function () {
			$("div.popupCartList").fadeOut();
		})
	};

	function ShowPopupCartList() {
		$("div.popupCartList").fadeIn();
	}

	if (Sys && Sys.Application) {
		Sys.Application.add_load(doUpdate);
	}
	else {
		doUpdate();
	}
$(function(){
	var h_search_timer;

	$('.h-search input').focusin(function(e) {
		$('.h-search').addClass('show');
	})
	.focusout(function(e) {
		$('.h-search').removeClass('show');
	});

	$('.pc_btn_menu_wrap').bind('mouseenter', function(){

		if(!$(this).hasClass('show')){

			$(this).addClass('show');
			$('.pc_menu_wrap').stop(false, false).fadeIn();

		}else{

			$('.pc_menu_wrap').stop(false, false).fadeOut();
			$('.pc_btn_menu_wrap').removeClass('show');

		}
	});

	$('.pc_btn_menu_wrap').bind('mouseleave', function(){
		h_search_timer = setTimeout(function(){
			trace("common");
			$('.pc_menu_wrap').stop(false, false).fadeOut();
			$('.pc_btn_menu_wrap.show').removeClass('show');
		},400)
	});



	$('.pc_btn_menu_wrap').bind('click', function(){

		if(!$(this).hasClass('show')){
			$(this).addClass('show');
			$('.pc_menu_wrap').stop(false, false).fadeIn();
		}else{
			$('.pc_menu_wrap').stop(false, false).fadeOut();
			$('.pc_btn_menu_wrap.show').removeClass('show');
		}
	});

	$('.pc_menu_wrap').bind('mouseleave', function(){
		clearTimeout(h_search_timer);
		if(!$(this).hasClass('show')){
			$(this).addClass('show');
			$('.pc_menu_wrap').stop(false, false).fadeIn();
		}else{
			$('.pc_menu_wrap').stop(false, false).fadeOut();
			$('.pc_btn_menu_wrap.show').removeClass('show');
		}
	});
	$('.pc_menu_wrap').bind('mousemove', function(){
		clearTimeout(h_search_timer);
	});

});
</script>



<script>
var Distinct = function(){
  this.browser;
  this.device;
  this.ie;
  this.ua = navigator.userAgent;
}

Distinct.prototype.getDevice = function(){

  if(this.ua.search(/iPad/) != -1 || (this.ua.search(/Mobile/) == -1 && this.ua.search(/Android/) != -1)){
        this.device = 'pc';//"tablet";
  }else if(this.ua.search(/iPhone/) != -1 || this.ua.search(/Android/) != -1 || this.ua.search(/iPod/) != -1 || this.ua.search(/Android.*Mobile/) != -1){
    this.device = "phone";
  }else{
    this.device = "pc";
  }
  return this.device;
}
